programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pre-Christmas Juanita Willems is flat out, collecting, wrapping and distributing presents for foster children, even though Juanita is blind.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
As their Outward Bound adventure continues, a group of people living with physical disabilities tackle their fear of heights, and a challenging waka journey.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:

Année : 2008

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP30) How can a person who is blind review cars? We introduce you to Julio Supercharge, a content creator from Kenya pushing the boundaries by reviewing cars by touch and feel.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) Ryan Benoit runs a clothing brand from a storefront in Sudbury, Ontario. He wants to expand the brand to other parts of the country, but has to navigate his way past a major setback before that happens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S06EP05) Elizabeth catches Nathan's niece gambling with a card trick Lucas taught her, sparking conflict. Rosemary hosts a girls' night. Gowen makes Jessie and Clara a tempting offer.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux-Coulter) Kavan Smith (Leland Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: By Hook or By Cook
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Liam missed out on an ordinary childhood that most take for granted, and Bruce wants to give him an experience that will test his courage, determination and trust.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
How do the members of the national goalball team, and younger members of Alberta Sports and Recreation Association for the Blind (ASRAB), stay active when gatherings are prohibited? And what impact does sport have on their lives beyond the court?
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.desc:

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:

Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
